dialog.text: Do you need help?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: What is the real issue?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I don't even know, because I am not happy
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Anxiety about losing my job
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I have been sad at times, but I listen to pleasant music.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: When have you started feeling sad?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I had fear of losing my job at times.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I suggest doing stress relieving tasks
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I can't think of that of now, because last three month a go pay cut and nest month payoff
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Can you repeat that? You had a pay cut in the last three months?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Yeah and the company is planning layoff for some of the staffs
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: How do you know that layoffs are coming?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Why not try to work for Uber or Lyft to supplement your income?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: They sent circular to all staffs
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: What did it state? I am sorry to hear the news.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Have you looked at updating your resume and looking on job boards?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: No I think I will just do that now may be it will help
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: That is a great comment. Being pro-active and looking for similar jobs can help.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Yeah thanks
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: It' good to take initiative and start looking for other sources of income.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I believe it work if I try.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I usually search job boards. It is what I have dine in the past.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: It is important to believe in yourself.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I am thinking about uber
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I can also suggest Lyft...
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: What other feelings and thoughts can I discern for you?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I can't think of any now thanks for being there for me
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Bye for now
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I think that I can be here to answer.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Thanks it time to go
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: How are my suggestions helping to reduce your unhappy demeanor?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: OK. You can click the Quit/Finish
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Very helpful thanks and bye
dialog.speaker: usr

situation: Having been having panic attacks more often now that we are in quarantined

dialog.text: Hi how are you
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Could b better
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I understand it could be better
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: What is going on?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: My day could be better too sometimes, it may help to talk about it.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Ive been more depressed and more panic attacks since the quarantine
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: It sounds like you are really worried and have anxiety over the qurantine.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: From my experience it has helped tremendously to take a few deep breaths
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Yes so much. Afraid of getting it and than giving it to my very sick mlm
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I also have been worried about getting it and passing it on. I have been taking extra precautions to stay home and wash my hands often to try and prevent it.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Sometimes I don't think that's enough to prevent. My mom has cancer and it's been hurting not being able to see her because I don't want to take that risk
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: That is so difficult that you are concerned and upset that you can't see her.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: In my experience I've used video chat to help me get through hard times when I couldn't see my loved ones in person.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Yeah I've tried but it's not th same. Wish I could b there to help her through this. But with everything going on it's so hard
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: That's really hard, but I think you have it in you to keep doing your best and staying safe.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I guess so it's a struggle everyday. Appreciate talking to someone though
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I'm happy you were able to talk to me, I know talking about how I'm feeling helps me feel better sometimes.
dialog.speaker: sys

situation: I have been feeling down and depressed every day for months, mainly due to self-esteem issues.

dialog.text: Hello there, how are you feeling today?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I'm feeling pretty awful... I've been down and depressed for months now. It's hard to get through the days.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I understand. Is this related to the pandemic or is it something separate? I am sure that the pandemic has not helped, though!
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: It's definitely related! I lost my dream job, went to a lower paying one, and I gained a lot of weight while working from home.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Oh I can certainly relate to that one! I've gained a stone and a half in the last year. All this sitting around is not good for us!
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: It's definitely nice to know that other people are having similar emotions as me.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Sometimes just having someone to talk to who knows how you are feeling can be really helpful I think.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: It's sad that this year has been so awful. It's hard to convince myself that it's getting better any time soon..
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Can you make a list of all the things that you hope will be better next year so you can tick them off one by one?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: 1. Better job 2. Healthier habits 3. Better financial situation
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Well, the first and third one are out of your control really but you could make a start on the first one today if you liked :)
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: It's hard to take the first steps. I don't even know where to begin, sadly.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I can understand that. Perhaps you could join an exercise class or similar?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: That's a pretty good idea. Have you ever done something like that?
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I took an aerobics class once. It was quite fun and it was good exercise.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: That does sound like fun. Do you have any other suggestions?
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Well, it's maybe not the best time to be taking on a financial commitment but have you ever considered adopting a dog? Good company and good exercise
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Actually, I have a cat!
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Ah I have two - they are wonderful company. Alas you can't really walk with them though :)
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: They are great company. Sometimes when I am really feeling down, I remember that my cat needs me, so I need to stay strong.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Pets are great like that. Do you perhaps have a neighbour whose dog you could walk if you can't get one of your own?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: That's a great idea. I just moved into a new apartment complex a couple weeks ago. Maybe I can get to know my neighbors. A lot of them have dogs.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: It's a great way to make new friends too!
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Would you consider doing some voluntary work whilst you are out of work?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: That's also a good idea. I know a lot of food banks around me are in need of volunteers.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I think it would be a really worthwhile thing to do and you would get to meet new people too
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I hope I have been able to help you a little!
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I agree. I feel like I have a bunch of new ideas to start feeling better. I appreciate you talking to me.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: You are very welcome, it was my pleasure. Have a great day!
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Hi! How are you tonight?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I've been better. I just buried my dog yesterday
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: She was going to turn 15 next month
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Ouch! I'm so sorry to hear that. I never lost a dog, but I've lost cats.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Is 14 a good age for a dog?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I have my first dog so I don't know much, he is 9 years old and came with our house.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Actually, yes. She was old and had dementia.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: The oldest dog I evet had was 15
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I'm so sorry, losing a pet is very hard on us.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: How did your dog come with the house?
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Was that your only pet? Or do you have others? We moved from FL to KY and the little dog just hung out here, he really belonged to the neighbor's son who didn't want him, so he just ran around wild and wouldn't leave. I never had a dog, but it got cold, so i took him in. They never asked about him and after a week, I asked them if I could have the dog, so they said yes. I don't think they cared.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I wish I could give you a hug, really, there are no words to make this better as you already know the grief of losing a pet, it does get better, but it stings terribly at first.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I have 2 other dogs that are mine and my boyfriend has 2
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Thank you. that means a lot
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: We both had dogs when we met.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: So you definitely are a dog lover! I was in my 50s before I ever had a dog, now I wish I had more, they are really loving. Not like cats who don't care much about much except FOOD! lol
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I know when tragedy happens, I can't get stuck in depression, I sort of have to force myself to put one foot in front of the other. It's hard to have a healthy balance between grieving and continuing to live. Cry, then dry my eyes, pick up, go for a walk, don't get caught in grief, but yet don't deny it!
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: They get to be so close and you can really pick up on their emotions and stuff. That's what happens to me. I get stuck sometimes
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I get stuck too. But you are doing the right things, here you reached out to someone and I do care, so you are moving forward.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I always find it helpful just so have someone share my pain with me. Just to know I'm not alone.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Thanks. Another person who has pets helps
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: They understand
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I do understand. My mom died in 2010, right after she died, 1 of my cats died, my husband went into the hospital and almost died, so we went on vacation so I would not be consumed with grief, and do you know, we brought our pets and our cat died when we arrived here on vacation? I will never forget that. You know what. I knew I could either get consumed in grief, or push through. Man, that was hard. I prayed a lot and God got me through that and I had a good vacation, all things considered.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I will definitely pray for you too that God will comfort your heart and that you will be comforted by your other dogs and your boyfriend's dogs and that you will feel joy at times at the happy memories you had with your dog.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Oh wow, that sounds horrible. Pushing through though I guess is all one can do then. Thank you so much. I believe in prayer.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Prayer is what gets me through every day! :D It was rough, but I believe these hard times strengthen us in some way. Because life throws hard balls, and we have to move forward or be consumed.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: That's true. I'm glad I did this project. You really helped me.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I'm so glad I did too. It was a pleasure to meet you. And once again, (hug). :D
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: You too. Thanks so much. bye
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I have one more thing to say - wise words from this 92 year old lady at church named Sue. She told me this after my brother died. When you get older, everyone you know is practically dead. She said "Life is for the living, if you get caught up to much in all the death, you won't life." True words. God bless, have a good night.
dialog.speaker: sys

situation: They didn't invite me for the party for an special event

dialog.text: Hi
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I am really very angry with my friends for not inviting me
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Why is that?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I didn't did any anything wrong to my friends but they are simply saying they forget me
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: So they no need on me ,
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I am not important person to them
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I have been angry with friends as well, but time loves a hero, as they say.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: In my all events i am inviting them all but how they
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Why what happen..?
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: How long have your friends been neglecting you??
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: In last 2 events only , what about you
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Any other questions for me?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I know it is hard at times, but be strong.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: You are correct
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: sometime it will happen , but we should forget and move on
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: How many best friends do you have ?
dialog.speaker: usr

situation: Unable to care for myself while my wife is dealing with medical issues.

dialog.text: Hi , can I help you today? Would you like to share anything?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: yes
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Do you have anything specific on your mind?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: My wife is having medical issues and is unable to help me
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Oh, it seems like you are feeling alone, is that correct?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I need help on so many things
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Do you have a list of things in any order?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: The support of my wife has become very clear to me
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: That sounds very difficult for you and great job reaching out here today.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I am not lonely, just needing a way to be independent.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I can telling that you are very worried but also very capable because you have taking the time to search for some support.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: W@ould like to know what to do to be more independent.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Well, I used to feel the same way and I would take the time to call a close friend and spend time with my dogs everyday. Is that something you could do too?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Support in the community is not evident, would like to find associations.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: What would you do.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: That is very forward thinking and a great idea. A local church group can often support you.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Travel is a problem for Church involvement.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I understand, I have noticed that people who reach our for help as you have will attract people to them. Have you looked into an online church community?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: There are issues with people at church.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Yes, I agree that it is hard to find people who can help and not cause more harm. Online communities on reddit have specialized groups for people with your situation too.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Need support that is meaningful and compasionate.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Yes, I agree. Having time to sit down and write out your thoughts and feelings can sometimes help too. Maybe you can journal your feelings this week.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I will keep looking. there has got to be help.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Yes, you have started your journey today and I am very proud of you expressing and identifying your problems. Great first step.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: The need to continuen is clear, something has got to be available.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Yes, please use writing to list your feelings and problems this week and check back with us regularly. We are happy to help and always here for you. Thank you very much.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Things like appointments are required, how do you get to them?
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: You can reach out anytime or day and we will assist you.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Thanks for your help. You have good suggestions.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: You're welcome, Bye.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Bye
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: If you don't need anything else, you can kindly, end and finish for today. Thanks.
dialog.speaker: sys

situation: My ex who i loved so much and almost gave her everything cheated on me with another guy from my school , my relationship was almost 2 years until she dumped me.... and i had to go through an immense overthinking after the breakup for almost 6-7 months

dialog.text: Hello, how are you doing today?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: yea im good are u a pyschiratrist or something
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: No, I'm just a mturk worker but I'm completely willing to talk to you about stuff. Is there anything you had in mind?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: i have things about overthinking about my past sometimes she flashes on and off through my mind when some of my collegues express their feelings of emotions through their relationships
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Is there someone in your past that weighs on your mind?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: The feelings i put for her the emotions its all gone for waste, she was my first love though
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Going through a romantic loss can be a lot to process. You will be able to let go some day.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: yea i ve watched a lot of motivation to help me relax my self , and i ve heard a lot of people say good things to me , my friends and family :) as time passes ill get much better i guess soo
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: It is definitely helpful to reach out. You got people that like you.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Yea the only people around is the only valubale thing to u in this world
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Do i have to keep talking about my feelings to you ? i can trust you right :)
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Definitely keep talking to those people because that's gonna help a ton.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Yeah you can trust me :) I think we have a bit more to go.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: hmmm great!!! i like you a lot so how do i avoid falling for the wrong one
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Take things easy and don't worry too much about it, because things will fall in to place naturally if it is a good fit.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: yea thank you so much
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Have u ever fallen in love ?
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Yes I have a few times, and even though it hurts sometimes it is generally worth the risk.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: you must have gone through a lot i see , yea its worth the risk but also they away all that u have tooo :(
dialog.speaker: usr

situation: Due to COVID-19 I can not focus on studies and can't fine help

dialog.text: hi
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Online learning is not seems easy, Seems I am going to fail this year
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: chill my dear friend, nothing of that sort will happen
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: In-class learning was way better and I learned a lot but now its so confusing
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: everything you need is a little peace of mind, patience and little more effort
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Even working with online tools is hard
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: i understand, but just think everyone else like us are doing the same and facing the same difficulties
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I know but what is I loose a whole year in academic,
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Think positive my dear friend
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Shake all your negatives
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: But I have been in low grades continuously during my last semesters.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Just have the confidence within yourselves and believe in YOU, that is the most important thing
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Stop worrying , and think about what can make it better
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Well it is still hard to understand online learning tools
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Watch Youtube videos
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: And my internet sometime screws up when I am submitting the assignments
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I tried that but I am not tech savy
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Why cant you seek help from a friend of yours who studies well?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: And who is ready to spend time and help you
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Due to social distancing I am not meeting with many people
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: But thanks for talking to me it gives me lot of hope
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I shall try to learn from Youtube more maybe that is the only solution for online learning
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: you dont have to meet a lot of people, but atleast one or two of your friends with all the safety measures ? who could really help you,and also one of the best solution can be group studies as well
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: My pleasure dear friend
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: How are you today?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: is anything bothering you, today?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I am today very sad because my friends fighting with me
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: what are you fighting about?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: My friends avoiding my phone calls and message
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: so, you're feeling isolated because of this?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Yes i am feeling alone
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: this happens very common in friend groups. it is understandable that you feel upset
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: this happens very common in friend groups. it is understandable that you feel upset
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: did u have an argument?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Yes it is common
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Yes sometimes many arugument
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: what do u argue about
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: My friends problam and we are question it
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: its hard when you care about someone to not question there actions, when you feel you know whats best for them. is that how u r feeling?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I feel uncomfortable
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: you feel uncomfortable because your friends are ignoring your feelings?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: sometimes, people hide when they are confronted.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: i think it may be beneficial to give your friends some time, before attempting to speak with them again. maybe you can spend time with your family while you are waiting for them to cool down.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Yes i am sometime more in my friends
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: do u have any friends that are still talking to you?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: i think you should spend time with the people that make you feel wanted.
dialog.speaker: sys

situation: I can't figure out why my friends don't understand why I want to keep a bit distant during COVID

dialog.text: Can you help me?
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: sure, what seems to be the problem
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I can't figure out why my friends don't understand why I want to keep a bit distant during COVID
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I had the same issue with my friends as well
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Really? What happened?
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: We stopped getting together and going out places cause they were all closed
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Yes, that happened here. But they still wanted to come over despite government orders limiting gatherings.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: We now have weekly video call meetings instead, it helps us stay connected
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: That sounds like a good idea. Is it hard to do?
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Not at all, we use a program called Skype, that's free. You can use it on your phone or PC
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: My friends want to go out all the time. How can we connect during a Skype?
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Pick a time you'll both be available, and you'll both need the program. It's quite easy to use and there will be youtube videos that'll help you set it up, should you need it
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Do you do any activities together over Skype?
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: We usually just chat about our week or get advice on normal things, sometimes we'll play a drinking game and be goofy together.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Are there other games people can play together on Skype because I don't drink?
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Drinking isn't a requirement, usually we'll just chat if we don't feel like drinking
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I just want to connect and please my friends but it is hard to not have any physical contact and only be online.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I can understand that and it's definitely frustrating. But it'll be so much better once you can see other other again, cause absence makes the heart grow fonder
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Wow, I didn't think of it that way. That puts a positive twist on it.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Yes, I always like to look for the positive in any given situation
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Thanks for your help. I feel a lot better.
dialog.speaker: usr
